page.title: 13Ashington C.E. School
page.content: {Ashington Church of England {(Controlled) First School}caters for children between the ages of 5 and 10. The school comprises several buildings which have all been built at different times and the original school building, dated 1872, is now offices and the school hall. This is on the north side of Rectory Lane, with a hutted classroom and the school swimming pool. On the south side there are three more classrooms, a kitchen and another hutted classroom which was erected with parental help in 1980. There are 101 children on roll. Green Class -{(Mrs S Rollings is the {teacher)}has 22 Infants,{Blue Class {(Miss S Blair)}has 27 Infants,{Red {Class (Mrs E Donald)}has 26 Juniors, {Yellow Class (Mrs N Carter)}has 26 Juniors.{Mr D Breach}is the Headmaster
